subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Brooks Laich and David Steckel each scored in the third period, and Olaf Kolzig made 18 saves in the Washington Capitals’ 2-1 home victory over the Colorado Avalanche on Wednesday night.
snippet: Brooks Laich and David Steckel each scored in the third period, and Olaf Kolzig made 18 saves in the Washington Capitals’ 2-1 home victory over the Colorado Avalanche on Wednesday night.
